full_summary:
**Digital Workshop Lathe**

**Reference Number:** eb-812-21022860

**Solicitation Number:** 23-58077Z Version C

**Publication Date:** 2024-04-04

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-30T14:00:00
    This solicitation is closed to new submissions.

**Procurement Category:** Goods - High-Tech Electronic Equipment and Computer Services

**Description:**

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites you to submit a bid for the supply of a fully enclosed, digital workshop lathe for the Saguenay site. As part of the initiative to modernize NRC facilities, machine shop operations will require an increase in the accuracy, size, and complexity of machine parts, as well as increased safety.

**Bidding Requirements:**

* The procurement method for this solicitation is Competitive - Open Bidding.
* Bids will be selected based on Lowest Price.
* Trade Agreements applicable to this procurement include:
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* The contract is contingent on a trade agreement.
* The region of opportunity is Quebec (except NCR).

**Contract Terms:**

* Expected start date: None
* Expected end date: None

**Bidder Information:**

* For more information, contracts, or any inquiry, please contact:
  Kacendra Dion
  kacendra.dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca
  (049) 324-8125
  Saguenay, Quebec, Canada
	 Address: 501 Boul. de l'Université Est, Saguenay, QC
